item.name: matches
item.description: A box, appearing as any other box of matches you are accustomed to from your world. On the front, the box shows a warning, but the meaning isn't quite clear. The picture shows an all black match lighting a candle, a plus sign, and circular lines that appear to be wind.

item.name: candle
item.lockMessage: You strike a match, setting the candle aflame. Like a hurricane, wind gusts around you, lifting your feet from the ground. With just a blink, you have moved to a new room, barely catching your footing as the wind disappears.
item.description: This is a candle.

item.name: lizard key
item.description: Long and heavy, rusted on a lizard's belly. A key of this shape must be used for an escape. Find your own entry, the alternative could be deadly.

item.name: skeleton key
item.description: Made of bone, stained with age, the key is long.

item.name: library key
item.description: Long like a dagger, the key features a book at the pommel and small teeth at the point.

item.name: portrait1
item.description: A woman in a color block dress points in the direction of the locked chest. Her other hand is placed where her mouth would be on her headless body.

item.name: portrait2
item.description: Smoke swirls through the air from the end of a pipe that, like the female portrait, floats where the mouth would be if the man in the portrait wasn't headless. The well dressed man is otherwise holding a book titled "Surviving the Library".

item.name: portrait3
item.description: A guillotine stands tall with a sharp blade at the top is at the ready to drop on an already headless man in dirty rags. Headless figures crowd around the guillotine in a town square, all of them pointing out in your direction.

item.name: salt ring
item.description: A thick line of salt circles the table, not a break in sight.

item.name: chest key
item.description: the key is covered in black ash.".

item.name: locked chest
item.lockMessage: You hear whispering coming from the west. better go see what it is.
item.description: Clunky and large, a metal chest with weird symbols rests on top of the table. An ancient, copper lock keeps the chest closed.

item.name: doll
item.description: The face is pressed in as if someone had smashed the doll on the floor. With what is left of the mouth, you swear that you saw it smirk at you.

item.name: knife
item.description: Sharp and pointy, ready for cutting, chopping, or even stabbing.

item.name: rope
item.description: Tangled beyond usability, the rope doesn't seem to be worth your time.

item.name: pickaxe
item.description: Rusted metal and a warn handle isn't the most ideal aspects in a potential weapon, but it's better than nothing.

item.name: brown miners hat
item.description: Rather boring and old with a busted light on the front, seeming rather useless in an attempt to escape this world.

item.name: gas mask
item.description: Modeled after a plague doctors mask, a long nose stems out the front of the mask, holding a metal canister at the end. Large glass, circular to form windows around the wearers eyes are shattered beyond further use.

item.name: diamond tiara
item.description: Shimmering with hundreds of diamonds, the tiara glimmers at every angle. While an item as such could be very valuable, it isn't much help in your escape.

item.name: sapphire necklace
item.description: Mesmerizing to view, the blue of the sapphire reflects onto your skin. While an item as such could be very valuable, it isn't much help in your escape.

item.name: riddle
item.description: With gold shining high in the sky, a bird cannot soar if it cannot fly. A stream that flows is a life to grow, a stream not of water may death undergo. Unlocking a secret is not a forfeit, go forward with the lizard to be rewarded.

item.name: flowers
item.description: A fresh bouquet of black roses lay on the rotted bench next to a photograph.

item.name: photograph
item.description: A young boy in overalls plays in a sandbox with action figures. Just beyond the fence of the yard, the outline of a man can be seen, his face covered in shadow.

item.name: sculpture
item.description: It's just a normal sculpture

item.name: tombstone
item.description: A tombstone with your name reads, "RIP to you. You're never escaping this world!".

item.name: magic cape
item.description: A cape has a message sewn into the collar, "Fly high, fly fast, fly free, fly just".
